mapper.select:
select m.major_id as majorId, m.major_name as majorName, m.college_id as collegeId, m.person_in_charge_id as personInChargeId, t.teacher_name as personInChargeName, t.phone, c.college_name as collegeName from major m left join college c on m.college =c.college_id left join teacher t on m.person_in_charge_id = t.teacher_id where m.is_del = true
and m.major_name like '%${majorName}%'
and t.teacher_name like '%${personInChargeName}%'
and t.phone like '%${phone}%'
and m.college_name like '%${collegeName}%'

select m.major_id as majorId, m.major_name as majorName, m.college_id as collegeId, m.person_in_charge_id as personInChargeId, t.teacher_name as personInChargeName, t.phone, c.college_name as collegeName from major m left join college c on m.college =c.college_id left join teacher t on m.person_in_charge_id = t.teacher_id where m.major_id = #{majorId}
